descriptionHtml:
This is a compilation of the resources I made for my mod "Demonika". I put in this file the ones which were rejected in the final version, plus the ones I used. Some are nice stuff, others are just the purest crap (in case you want to change them in order to make them usable, do as you wish).

There are:

- 2 new robes

- 2 new banners

- 8 altar clothes

- 3 round rugs

- 1 new altar, which is Mehrunes Dagon´s altar without his head and his razor´s pieces. 

These are modders´resources and they are not ingame yet. I included an .esp file for evaluation. To check them out:

 -Activate evildemonicTEST.esp and launch skyrim. Use the console and type "coc AAevildemonic" to go to the test cell, and "coc AAevilaltar" to see a sample of what can be done with them. 

You may use, modify and redistribute this as you wish,just give me the credits and make no commercial use of it of course.
author: Leodoidao
